article_node.title: Trump Enemy John Bolton Reveals America’s ‘Main Threat’
article_node.summary: Former national security adviser John Bolton warned that the United States faces a tightening coalition of authoritarian powers—China, Russia, India, and North Korea—whose recent military parade and diplomatic displays signal a shift toward a new global order. He cited India’s refusal to engage with Trump amid escalating tariffs and its growing ties to Russia and China as a key concern. Bolton’s op‑ed underscores the growing geopolitical rivalry and the potential erosion of U.S. influence in the coming years.
